/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The street is flanked by towering buildings and skyscrapers, their glass and concrete facades reflecting the overcast sky. The roads are filled with cars, adding to the dynamic energy of the city. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, a reflection of the urban environment interspersed with patches of vegetation.
